SEARCH
Package model

Class Flora

java.lang.Object
model.Species
model.Flora
public class Flora extends Species
Represents a flora species in the biodiversity catalog. Extends the abstract Species class with specific attributes for plant life.

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates a new flora species with all its specific characteristics.

  • Constructor Details

    • Flora

      public Flora(String name, String scientificName, SpeciesType type, boolean hasFlowers, boolean hasFruits, double maxHeight)
      Creates a new flora species with all its specific characteristics.
      Parameters:
      name - The common name of the flora species
      scientificName - The scientific name in binomial nomenclature
      hasFlowers - Whether the plant produces flowers
      hasFruits - Whether the plant produces fruits
      maxHeight - The maximum height the plant can reach in meters

  • Method Details

      public boolean isHasFlowers()

      Returns:
